description: The Chainlink bootcamp certificate is an SBT (Soul Bound Token) issued to developers who participate in the Chainlink bootcamp and successfully complete programming tasks. This SBT cannot be traded.
name: Chainlink Bootcamp Certificate Level 1

attributes.trait_type: Day 1 task: Create a NFT collection with CL VRF.
Day 2 task: Create a dynamic NFT with CL functions.
Day 3 task: Create a crodd-chain NFT with CL CCIP.
